events.alt: Aerial view of Crantock Beach and surroundings
events.body: Join us for an afternoon of fun. Meet at Crantock lifesaving hut, we'll start with a beach clean followed by a bbq ending with a live band at the Cornishman. Free give aways from our local sponsors.

events.eventTitle: Friends of Poldhu - Keeping Poldhu Beach as nature intended
events.body: Join the Friends of Poldhu for their beach clean on the first Friday of every month (10am Oct â€“ Mar | 7pm Apr-Sept) at Poldhu Cove (TR12 7BU).
